content.prompt: Which of the following conclusions is best supported by the posterâ€™s call for opposition to the Liberals without a recommendation for an alternative party or candidate?

choices.label: The suffrage movement rejected participation in the electoral process.
The suffrage movement favored a return to a strong monarchy in Great Britain.
The suffrage movement did not have a major political party that represented its interests.
The suffrage movement favored an anarchist system of government.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
